charges.charge_description: 21:841 - did possess with intent to distribute cocaine base (crack)

charges.charge_offence_description: 21:841 - did possess with intent to distribute coc

charges.charge_description: NARCOTICS - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE - Possession with intent to distribute crack cocaine(3s)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 240 months imprisonment as to count 3, 120 months imprisonment as to count 4, to run concurrent with credit for time served on federal detainer; 8 years supervised release as to count 3, 3 years supervised release as to count 4 to run concurrent; $200.00 special assessment. The Court recommends to the Bureau of Prisons that defendant be screened for enrollment in the substance abuse treatment program

charges.charge_description: UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC. - Felon in Possession of a Firearm(4s)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 240 months imprisonment as to count 3, 120 months imprisonment as to count 4, to run concurrent with credit for time served on federal detainer; 8 years supervised release as to count 3, 3 years supervised release as to count 4 to run concurrent; $200.00 special assessment. The Court recommends to the Bureau of Prisons that defendant be screened for enrollment in the substance abuse treatment program

charges.charge_description: SEIZURE, FORFEITURE AND DISPOSITION OF FIREARM(5s)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 240 months imprisonment as to count 3, 120 months imprisonment as to count 4, to run concurrent with credit for time served on federal detainer; 8 years supervised release as to count 3, 3 years supervised release as to count 4 to run concurrent; $200.00 special assessment. The Court recommends to the Bureau of Prisons that defendant be screened for enrollment in the substance abuse treatment program
